overview:
Inspirator, facilitator and support for senior management Researcher and creator

Education: PhD in Business Management Masters Engineer in Telecommunications Executive MBA Knowledge Associates accredited practitioner

Experience: Entrepreneur and advisor. He is also Director Partner at Avanzalis Management, a firm of which he is founder. He combines his professinoal activity with others as Fellow Professor at the University of Barcelona and Collaborator at ESADE Business School. At Avanzalis he also works as senior consultant, leading organizational development initiatives providing strategic support to senior management of organizations. His areas of specialization include Strategic Knowledge Management and Innovation. He has led several initiatives for large organizations in Spain and worldwide. Some references are: UN IFAD, Grupo Siro, Ercros, Caja Sabadell, Grupo Godo, ACE Group, Pharmaceutical Federation, Group Geci, Dalphi.

Forums and international associations: Active member of The New Club of Paris (NCP) www.the-new-club-of-paris.org Leads the Barcelona cell of the Iberoamerican Community for Knowledge Systems (CISC) www.iberoamericana.org He is member of the Knowledge Management Committee of the Spanish Association of Managers (AED) www.aed96.es Promotes business activities in the Official College of Telecommunications Engineers of Catalonia (COETC)

Teaching and Lecturing: He collaborates in several forums and congresses. He gives conferences and conducts sessions in institutions such as University of Barcelona, Spanish Association of Managers, Business School Estema, Postgraduate Training Center of UPV, Adeit UV University BDigital Congress and Ford among others.

Other activities: He has enjoyed several residences in the United States as a member of IBM Management Council. He has worked in some think tanks, contributing to the achievement of several books on communities of practice, knowledge management among others.
